medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressively worsening right lower quadrant abdominal pain for 40 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 40 hours ago with gradually worsening right lower quadrant abdominal pain. He initially experienced some anorexia, but in the last 24 hours has felt hungry. Intermittent nausea is present, which waxes and wanes, but he denies vomiting. No associated fevers, chills, chest pain, shortness of breath, or changes in bowel habits.
